title: Brady Quinn on Jerry Richardson statue, Browns a playoff contender, Mahomes/Smith (Football 07/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn to break down some of the bigger storylines around the NFL this offseason. Can the Browns be the second best team in the AFC North? Can the Eagles be a team that misses the playoffs next year? Will the Chiefs be better or worse with Patrick Mahomes under center versus Alex Smith? What should the Panthers do with Jerry Richardson's statue? All that and much, much more.

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Brady Quinn joins Will Brinson to talk if the Browns can rebound in a big way, if the Eagles will miss the playoffs, the Jerry Richardson statue and if the Chiefs will be better with Patrick Mahomes.
